alert.note: Alert for Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:56PM PST until January 17 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Areas of blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations up to an inch. * WHERE...Rosalia, Colfax, Oakesdale, Uniontown, Tekoa, La Crosse, and Pullman. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow rates of between 0.5 and 1 inch per hour will occur before 5PM.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
